attributes.action: STOP THE UK POST CODED KILLING OF OUR DOGS
attributes.background: THE WORD "TYPE" BREED HAS BEEN MANIPULATED IN WHAT USED TO BE METROPOLITAN DISTRICT CROWNS UNLIKE THE REST OF THE UK THEY ARE NO LESS THAN TORTURING AND MURDERING OUR BEST FRIENDS 1 UK LAW FOR ALL

rejection.details:
If, for example, you want the Law to be changed, to stop certain breeds of dogs from being put down, we currently have a petition open calling for this which you could sign: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/131936 

If there is an issue about the enforcement of this law within particular postcode areas, we'd be very happy to help you start a new petition which would meet our rules. If you would like us to help you, please do get in touch: petitionscommittee@parliament.uk
